Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-35945 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-35945 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-8. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cmake is earlier than 3.21.4-8, affected by CVE-2023-35945
